pages.title: About me
pages.text: Ryhan is a software developer, experienced in backend development and big data tech stecks. Solid in building large scale distributed services and new generation of low latency big data processing pipelines, Ryan has made huge contributes to the cloud business of Amazon and Google.

posts.title: First Blog
posts.text: Hello world!I created this brand new blog for a new learning session.This has been my fourth year of being a software engineer in US. I’ve learned great things from the experience in Amazon and Google. However, sometimes I feel it’s harder to keep improving myself as time accumulates. Now is the time to make a change! Stay hungry, stay foolish.
